content: now pointing at the hand holding the hook is now considered the front side the side facing away from you is now the back side double_crochet in single_crochet in the back side that is parallel to the front double_crochet just made slip_stitch in next single_crochet in the front side and back side together first finger made double_crochet in next single_crochet in front side double_crochet in next single_crochet in back side slip_stitch in next single_crochet in front side and back side together 3x s 3 fingers made there will be 1 single_crochet that will be left unworked finish off 8 double_crochet and 4 sl sts = 4 fingers stuff firmly with fiber fill with the thumb facing up sew the right arm between rnds 13 &18 in kind of a waving position weave in tail with the thumb facing on the top of hand with the palm at a slight downward angle sew the left arm point more in a downward angle weave in ends feet make 2 starting at the bottom of the foot chain 2 or use the magic loop round 1 2 single_crochet 5 double_crochet single_crochet in 2 chain from hook or in the magic loop place marker in last nd single_crochet made 3 single_crochet 5 double_crochet round 2 2 single_crochet in each of next 2 single_crochet 2 half_double_crochet in next double_crochet 2 double_crochet in next double_crochet double_crochet in next double_crochet 2 double_crochet in next double_crochet 2 half_double_crochet in next double_crochet 2 single_crochet in next single_crochet move up marker 6 single_crochet 4 half_double_crochet 5 double_crochet round 3 working in back loop single_crochet in next 6 sts working in both loops single_crochet treble_crochet single_crochet in the next 5 double_crochet making sure that the treble_crochet is poking out on the right side of work toes made working in back look single_crochet in next 4 sts move up marker 20 single_crochet 5 treble_crochet round 4 working in both loops now and throughout single_crochet in next 6 single_crochet pull up loop in next single_crochet skip next treble_crochet pull up loop in next single_crochet yo pull through 3 loops on hook decrease made repeat 4 more times single_crochet in next 4 single_crochet move up marker 10 single_crochet 5 single_crochet decrease round 5 single_crochet in next 6 single_crochet half_double_crochet decrease over next 2 sts half_double_crochet in next st half_double_crochet decrease over next 2 sts single_crochet in next 4 single_crochet move up marker 10 single_crochet 2 half_double_crochet decrease 1 half_double_crochet rnds 6 - 8 single_crochet in each st around move up marker at end of each row finish off leaving a long tail for sewing to body stuff firmly with fiberfill sew to the bottom of the body weave in ends featured on bbcamerica com
